item.description:
SPARE TIME IS FULL WITH LEAGUES AND HAD NO ROOM FOR US! SO WE ARE GOING TO BRADLEY BOWL ON ROUTE 75 IN WINDSOR LOCKS INSTEAD. SAME BAT TIME, SAME BAT CHANNEL. HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE!

Weâ€™ll gather at Spare Time on Route 83 in Vernon for a couple of games. Start time will be around 7:00 PM, depending on what's available when we make the reservation. Those who RSVP will get an update with the exact time!
item.how_to_find_us: Don is the host and will meet members near the front desk.
item.name: A Night at the Lanes (Bowling, that is!)-- CHANGE OF VENUE
